controls.why_reg_cite: Understand nature/purpose; risk-based monitoring; event-driven updates. 12 CFR §748.2; 31 CFR Part 1020. ([law.cornell.edu](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/12/748.2?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Collect expected activity and BO info; maintain high-risk playbooks (MSB, cross-border, cash-intensive).
controls.timers_slas: Refresh per risk tier; event-driven updates when anomalies detected.
controls.edge_cases: Trusts as owners; complex layered structures.
controls.access_control: BSA + onboarding teams.
controls.alerts_metrics: % high-risk without EDD < SLA; BO certification staleness.

controls.name: OFAC Screening & Holds
controls.why_reg_cite: Sanctions compliance; blocking/rejecting transactions; 10-year record retention from **Mar 12, 2025**. 31 CFR Part 501; Part 594. ([ecfr.gov](https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-31/subtitle-B/chapter-V/part-501?toc=1\&utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Screen members, counterparties, and payments at onboarding and pre-execution; block or reject per program; capture blocking reports.
controls.timers_slas: File required OFAC reports per Part 501 timelines; retain records **10 years**. ([Federal Register](https://www.federalregister.gov/documents/2024/10/08/2024-23217/reporting-procedures-and-penalties-regulations?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.edge_cases: Program-specific licenses; false positives; 50% rule aggregation.
controls.access_control: Sanctions team only; strict confidentiality.
controls.alerts_metrics: Hit rate; decision time; overdue blocked-property reports.

controls.name: Monitoring & Case Mgmt
controls.why_reg_cite: Detect and report suspicious activity. 31 CFR §1020.320. ([ecfr.gov](https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-31/subtitle-B/chapter-X/part-1020/subpart-B/section-1020.220?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Generate alerts from rules/models; case queue with dispositions; feed to SAR decision.
controls.timers_slas: Triage ≤ **2 business days**; decision within **30 days** of detection if SAR-worthy.
controls.edge_cases: Continued activity; insider abuse; structuring patterns.
controls.access_control: Need-to-know; segregation from lines of business.
controls.alerts_metrics: Aging buckets; % closed ≤ SLA; repeat subjects.
controls.purpose: Detect unusual activity; routing to SAR decision

controls.name: CTR Filing
controls.why_reg_cite: Report >$10k cash transactions aggregated by person/day. 31 CFR §1010.311; filing per §1010.306. ([ecfr.gov](https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-31/subtitle-B/chapter-X/part-1010/subpart-E/section-1010.520?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Auto-aggregate cash in/out per EIN/SSN per business day; flag exemptions (Phase I/II) and maintain DEP list; e-file CTR.
controls.timers_slas: File **within 15 days** of transaction(s); annual exemption review.
controls.edge_cases: Multiple branches; agencies; ineligible businesses.
controls.access_control: BSA Ops only.
controls.alerts_metrics: CTR timeliness; exemption recertification past due.

controls.name: SAR Filing & Confidentiality
controls.why_reg_cite: Detect/report suspicious transactions; protect SAR confidentiality. 31 CFR §1020.320. ([ecfr.gov](https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-31/subtitle-B/chapter-X/part-1020/subpart-B/section-1020.220?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Manage SAR decision workflow; ensure SAR and supporting docs retained 5 years; restrict SAR visibility; Board reporting cadence.
controls.timers_slas: **30 days** (suspect known) / **60 days** (no suspect); **90-day** continuing SAR cadence.
controls.edge_cases: Insider abuse (file regardless of amount); subpoenas for SARs (decline & notify FinCEN/NCUA).
controls.access_control: Strict “SAR room” permissions.
controls.alerts_metrics: SAR timeliness; % cases escalated to SAR.

controls.name: Monetary Instruments Logs
controls.why_reg_cite: $3k–$10k monetary instruments purchase records. 31 CFR §1010.415. ([ecfr.gov](https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-12/chapter-VII/subchapter-A/part-748/section-748.2?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Capture identity, instrument, serials; monthly consolidation.
controls.timers_slas: Send to central by **15th** monthly; retain **5 years**.
controls.edge_cases: Aggregation across windows/locations.
controls.access_control: Branch managers + Compliance.
controls.alerts_metrics: Missing serials; late logs.

controls.name: Travel Rule (Wires ≥$3,000)
controls.why_reg_cite: Maintain/transmit transmittor/beneficiary data. 31 CFR §1010.410(e),(f). ([law.cornell.edu](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/31/1020.220?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Require fields before release; store originator/beneficiary/ FI identifiers; include in outgoing orders.
controls.timers_slas: Pre-release validation required.
controls.edge_cases: Non-consumer ACH/ATM/POS exclusions.
controls.access_control: Payments ops; read for BSA.
controls.alerts_metrics: % wires missing data; rejects.

controls.name: Information Sharing (314(a)/(b))
controls.why_reg_cite: Mandatory searches (314(a)); optional safe-harbor sharing (314(b)). 31 CFR §1010.520; §1010.540. ([law.cornell.edu](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/31/1010.520?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Intake FinCEN SISS requests; search accounts/transactions across specified lookback windows; track 14-day clock; maintain 314(b) certification status and counterpart verification.
controls.timers_slas: **14 days** unless otherwise specified; annual 314(b) certification.
controls.edge_cases: SAR confidentiality in 314(b) exchanges.
controls.access_control: BSA Officer controlled.
controls.alerts_metrics: Outstanding 314(a) items; expired 314(b) certs.

controls.name: Record Retention
controls.why_reg_cite: 5-year baseline for BSA; OFAC records **10 years** from 3/12/2025. 31 CFR §1010.430; 31 CFR Part 501. ([GovInfo](https://www.govinfo.gov/link/cfr/31/1010?link-type=pdf\&sectionnum=430\&year=mostrecent\&utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Apply retention schedules by record type; legal holds override; purge with audit logs.
controls.timers_slas: Purge after required period unless on hold.
controls.edge_cases: Credit-card CIP dormancy; litigation holds.
controls.access_control: Records mgmt + Compliance.
controls.alerts_metrics: % records with assigned schedule; purge backlog.

controls.name: Escalation Pathway
controls.why_reg_cite: Prompt internal reporting; regulator notifications under program rules. 12 CFR §748.2; related guidance. ([law.cornell.edu](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/12/748.2?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: One-click “Breach/Emergent Issue” escalation to BSA Officer/GC; incident ticketing; regulator contact book.
controls.timers_slas: Internal acknowledgment ≤ **1 business day**; action plan ≤ **5 business days**.
controls.edge_cases: SAR confidentiality during incident handling.
controls.access_control: Need-to-know (BSA/GC/CEO).
controls.alerts_metrics: Open incidents; time-to-closure.

controls.name: Training
controls.why_reg_cite: Role-appropriate BSA/AML/OFAC training. 12 CFR §748.2(c). ([law.cornell.edu](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/12/748.2?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Assign curricula by role; completion tracking; Board and committee training tracked separately.
controls.timers_slas: Complete within **30 days** of hire; annual refresh by **policy anniversary**.
controls.edge_cases: Contractors/fintech partners with access.
controls.access_control: HR + Compliance.
controls.alerts_metrics: Completion rate; past-due learners.

controls.name: Independent Testing
controls.why_reg_cite: Periodic independent testing of program and CIP. 12 CFR §748.2(c). ([law.cornell.edu](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/12/748.2?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Audit calendar; scope mapping to controls; issue tracking to remediation.
controls.timers_slas: Every **12–18 months**; track remediation SLAs.
controls.edge_cases: Conflicts of interest.
controls.access_control: Audit/Compliance only.
controls.alerts_metrics: Open findings; repeat findings rate.

controls.name: High-Risk Categories (MSB, Correspondent, Private Banking)
controls.why_reg_cite: Risk-based EDD expectations for elevated typologies; MSB oversight. (Program rules; 31 CFR §1010.100(ff) definitions). ([ecfr.gov](https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-31/subtitle-B/chapter-X/part-1020?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Apply category checklists; require FINCEN registration checks for MSBs; license verification; site visit capture.
controls.timers_slas: Annual EDD refresh; more frequent as risk dictates.
controls.edge_cases: Mixed-business revenues; ineligible activities.
controls.access_control: BSA due diligence team.
controls.alerts_metrics: Lapses in MSB renewals; unresolved red flags.
controls.purpose: EDD for MSBs; correspondent/private banking filters

controls.name: CMIR (Cross-Border Currency)
controls.why_reg_cite: Report >$10k cross-border physical transport. 31 CFR §1010.340; filing logistics. ([law.cornell.edu](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/31/1010.340?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Identify scenarios (own shipments/receipts); generate Form 105; store confirmations.
controls.timers_slas: **15 days** after receipt; by mailing/shipping date if not accompanying a person. ([Federal Register](https://www.federalregister.gov/documents/2025/06/18/2025-11211/agency-information-collection-activities-proposed-renewal-comment-request-renewal-without-change-of?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.edge_cases: Common carriers (armored) guidance.
controls.access_control: Treasury Ops + BSA.
controls.alerts_metrics: Late filings.

controls.name: FBAR
controls.why_reg_cite: Report foreign financial accounts >$10k aggregate. 31 CFR §1010.350. ([ecfr.gov](https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-31/subtitle-B/chapter-X/part-1010?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Inventory foreign accounts; calendar deadlines; e-file via BSA system.
controls.timers_slas: **Apr 15** (automatic extension to Oct 15).
controls.edge_cases: Consolidated subsidiaries.
controls.access_control: Treasury + BSA.
controls.alerts_metrics: Missing account attestations.

controls.name: Prepaid Access & Third Parties
controls.why_reg_cite: Risk-based controls over prepaid programs and vendors; sanctions obligations. 31 CFR Part 1010; 31 CFR Part 501. ([ecfr.gov](https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-31/subtitle-B/chapter-X/part-1020?utm_source=chatgpt.com))
controls.system_behavior: Require due-diligence package; contract clauses for data access/audit/sanctions; set program limits in system.
controls.timers_slas: Annual vendor review; critical alerts real-time to TMS.
controls.edge_cases: Non-member purchases (restrict as per notes).
controls.access_control: Vendor Mgmt + Compliance.
controls.alerts_metrics: Data feed uptime; rule hit rates.

controls.name: PEP Screening & EDD
controls.why_reg_cite: Risk-based AML program and CIP; enhanced due diligence for higher-risk PEPs (no categorical prohibition). [31 CFR §1020.210](https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-31/subtitle-B/chapter-X/part-1020/subpart-B/section-1020.210); [31 CFR §1020.220](https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-31/subtitle-B/chapter-X/part-1020/subpart-B/section-1020.220); FFIEC BSA/AML Manual—PEPs.
controls.system_behavior: Screen applicants/BOs/signers against PEP datasets at onboarding/refresh; route PEP hits to EDD profile and elevated approval; adjust monitoring for cash/wires/cross-border/high-risk geos/state-owned.
controls.timers_slas: EDD before activation (high-risk) or 30 days (moderate); annual refresh high-risk, biennial moderate (per BA-02).
controls.edge_cases: Domestic/foreign/former PEPs (foreign/former higher risk); associates/family as PEP-related; false positives require verification.
controls.access_control: Restricted to KYC/EDD analysts, BSA Officer, auditors (read-only).
controls.alerts_metrics: % PEP hits closed in SLA; false positives #; EDD refresh overdue; SAR rate for PEPs vs. baseline.
controls.purpose: Identify PEPs, apply risk-based EDD, heightened approvals/monitoring where warranted

controls.name: Privacy Notice Lifecycle
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Initial/annual/revised notices and permitted delivery. 12 CFR §1016.4, §1016.5, §1016.8, §1016.9.
controls.system_behavior: ** Source-of-truth `privacy.notice.vX` per product/channel; block non-exception sharing until notice delivered and opt-out status honored.
controls.timers_slas: ** Initial at/before relationship; annual 12 months; revised prior to change.
controls.edge_cases: ** Joint accounts → one notice to primary; dormant but existing relationships still require notice unless exempt.
controls.access_control: ** Privacy/Compliance publish templates.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** % accounts missing notice; exemptions applied.

controls.name: Opt-Out Capture and Honoring
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Reasonable means to opt out before non-affiliate sharing. §1016.7.
controls.system_behavior: ** Provide at least two channels (portal toggle + mail/web form). Decision layer enforces `sharing.blocklist` for marketing/non-exception flows and propagates to martech vendors.
controls.timers_slas: ** Immediate enforcement; vendor propagation ≤30 days.
controls.edge_cases: ** Household vs individual; returned mail; authorized agent requests.
controls.access_control: ** Customer/verified agent only.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Suppression leakage; time-to-propagate.

controls.name: Permissible Disclosures & Exceptions
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Service provider/joint marketing (§1016.13), servicing/processing (§1016.14), legal/protective (§1016.15).
controls.system_behavior: ** Each disclosure tagged with legal basis `(privacy.share.basis)`; vendor must have GLBA confidentiality clause `(vendor.contract.glba_clause=true)`.
controls.timers_slas: ** RFPA steps before government release; emergency exceptions documented.
controls.edge_cases: ** Securitizations/servicing sales; LE delay requests.
controls.access_control: ** Legal/Privacy approval for “legal” basis.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** % disclosures missing basis/contract.

controls.name: Customer Access & Authentication
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Verify identity before disclosing customer information. §1016.9; NCUA §748; RFPA.
controls.system_behavior: ** In-person gov ID; phone KBA/MFA; online authenticated session; PoA verified for agents.
controls.timers_slas: ** Provide policy copies within **10 days** (program standard).
controls.edge_cases: ** Refuse if auth fails; sensitive items via secure channel.
controls.access_control: ** CSR roles; least privilege.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Auth failure rate; misdelivery incidents.

controls.name: Data Accuracy & Corrections
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Accurate/current/complete; propagate corrections. Reg V; NCUA §748; Part 717.
controls.system_behavior: ** Master-data correction propagates to all systems and prior recipients where applicable.
controls.timers_slas: ** Prompt; ≤30 days for bureau-reported items where applicable.
controls.edge_cases: ** USPS/NCOA → Red Flag letter; legal holds pause updates.
controls.access_control: ** Dual-control for critical identifiers.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Time-to-correct; repeat corrections.

controls.name: Employee Access Minimization & Training
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Need-to-know; training. NCUA §748 App. A.
controls.system_behavior: ** RBAC; quarterly access reviews; 24-hour termination revocation; annual privacy training.
controls.timers_slas: ** Onboarding/annual training; quarterly reviews.
controls.edge_cases: ** Contractors/data minimization; BYOD prohibitions for NPPI unless MDM-controlled.
controls.access_control: ** Security/IT + Privacy for elevated roles.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Orphaned accounts; overdue training.

controls.name: Third-Party Oversight and Contracts
controls.why_reg_cite: ** GLBA provider exception requires confidentiality/purpose limits; IR program requires vendor readiness. §1016.13; NCUA §748.
controls.system_behavior: ** Due diligence, GLBA addendum, data map, subprocessor flow-downs; continuous monitoring.
controls.timers_slas: ** Before first transfer; annual review.
controls.edge_cases: ** U.S. hosting preference; LE data-request handling by vendor.
controls.access_control: ** Legal/Privacy approvals.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Vendors missing clauses/assessments.

controls.name: Secure Disposal of NPPI
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Reasonable measures to dispose consumer report info/NPPI. 16 CFR Part 682; NCUA §748.
controls.system_behavior: ** Enforce retention schedule; certified destruction (paper/media); defensible wiping.
controls.timers_slas: ** Dispose ≤90 days; legal holds pause.
controls.edge_cases: ** Locked shred bins; chain-of-custody.
controls.access_control: ** Records + Compliance approvals.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Past-due disposals.

controls.name: Incident Response & Breach Notification
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Detect, contain, notify; regulator/member notices as required. NCUA §748 App. B; state breach laws; RFPA; SAR confidentiality.
controls.system_behavior: ** IR runbook integrates privacy/legal; classify data types/states; customer notice templates ready.
controls.timers_slas: ** Without unreasonable delay; state clocks govern.
controls.edge_cases: ** LE request for delay; payment card incidents consider PCI DSS expectations.
controls.access_control: ** IR team; need-to-know.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** MTTD/MTTR; root-cause trends.

controls.name: Recordkeeping, Complaints & Board Reporting
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Board oversight and records. NCUA §748.
controls.system_behavior: ** Centralize complaint logs, notices, opt-outs, metrics.
controls.timers_slas: ** ≥ annually.
controls.edge_cases: ** High-risk complaints escalated ad hoc.
controls.access_control: ** Privacy Officer curates.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Complaint rates; repeats.

controls.name: Website Posting and E-SIGN Delivery
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Permitted electronic delivery/consent. §1016.9; 15 USC §7001.
controls.system_behavior: ** Host current notice; capture e-consent and retain artifact; ADA-accessible format.
controls.timers_slas: ** 10-day fulfillment.
controls.edge_cases: ** Mail on request; language access where offered.
controls.access_control: ** Web/Compliance owners.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Link uptime; SLA hits.

controls.name: State Variants (CA/CPRA, Vermont, Nevada) — Non-GLBA data only
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Apply stricter state rules to **non-GLBA** data (e.g., marketing telemetry, prospect lists).
controls.system_behavior: ** Jurisdiction tagging `(cust.jurisdiction)`; separate GLBA NPPI from non-GLBA telemetry; honor CA “Do Not Sell/Share” for ad tech; Vermont/Nevada marketing limits.
controls.timers_slas: ** CA response windows per statute (for non-GLBA data processed).
controls.edge_cases: ** Suppression lists for marketing; agent requests.
controls.access_control: ** Privacy Ops + Legal.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** SLA adherence (where applicable).

controls.name: Anonymization & Aggregation (optional)
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Allow analytics/R\&D using data that does **not** identify individuals (inspired by industry practice).
controls.system_behavior: ** Use documented anonymization/aggregation; prohibit re-identification; keep GLBA NPPI out of public aggregates.
controls.timers_slas: ** Review methods **annually**.
controls.edge_cases: ** Small cohorts → apply thresholds.
controls.access_control: ** Data Science + Privacy review.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Re-id risk score.

controls.name: Cookies & Online Tracking (non-GLBA)
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Govern marketing/analytics cookies; apply CA “Do Not Sell/Share” to ad tech; keep servicing cookies distinct.
controls.system_behavior: ** Banner & preference center; block non-essential tags until consent (where required); honor universal opt-out signals (e.g., GPC) for CA users.
controls.timers_slas: ** Consent before load; periodic renewal per policy.
controls.edge_cases: ** Logged-in vs logged-out; cross-device sync.
controls.access_control: ** Web team with Privacy sign-off.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Consent rates; tag leakage.

controls.name: Third-Party App/Account Connections (if offered)
controls.why_reg_cite: ** When members connect external apps (PFMs, merchants), we must scope purpose and limit disclosure (Reg P/RFPA).
controls.system_behavior: ** Explicit scoping/consent UI; purpose-limited tokens; clear revoke path; no reuse beyond consented scope.
controls.timers_slas: ** Immediate revocation on request.
controls.edge_cases: ** Merchant-initiated shares; subpoenas to third parties.
controls.access_control: ** API gateway owners; Privacy review of scopes.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Scope creep; stale tokens.

controls.name: Biometric Data for KYC (only if vendor uses it)
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Some KYC vendors use face-match/“liveness” checks; states impose special rules (e.g., BIPA/WA). GLBA still applies.
controls.system_behavior: ** Use vendor only with explicit contractual limits; collect only if required; prefer vendor-side storage; prohibit vendor model reuse.
controls.timers_slas: ** Retain only as necessary; purge per state law.
controls.edge_cases: ** Offer non-biometric path where feasible.
controls.access_control: ** Strict; minimal internal roles.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Biometric exceptions; purge compliance.

controls.name: Children’s Data
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Services are not directed to children under 13; ensure rapid removal if discovered. COPPA.
controls.system_behavior: ** Age gates; promptly delete on discovery; custodial/UTMA accounts treated as adult-owner NPPI.
controls.timers_slas: ** Prompt removal on discovery.
controls.edge_cases: ** Teen accounts only if product/legal explicitly allow.
controls.access_control: ** KYC/Compliance only.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Under-age attempts blocked.

controls.name: Policy Scope
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Safety-and-soundness requirements expect clear applicability and program boundaries so controls can be executed and tested (12 CFR Part 741; 12 CFR §748.0–§748.2).
controls.system_behavior: ** Maintain a machine-readable **Scope Registry** enumerating products, channels, vendors, and systems covered by resolution actions; expose scope to control engines so freezes/limits/exports apply deterministically.
controls.timers_slas: ** Update within 5 business days of any material change; publish to control engines within 24 hours of approval.
controls.edge_cases: ** Shadow IT or partner-owned sub-processors—require explicit inclusion or documented exception; joint/fintech programs must specify who executes freezes and exports.
controls.access_control: ** CRO owns content; Risk Eng maintains schema; changes require dual approval (CRO + CEO or delegate).
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Scope coverage % (controls mapped to all in-scope systems); age of last scope review; count of open scope exceptions.
controls.purpose: Define what products/channels/partners and systems are in/out of scope for resolution actions

controls.name: Early-Warning Indicators
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Enable timely action ahead of conservatorship/liquidation; safety/soundness expectations (12 CFR Part 741; FCUA §1786/§1787).
controls.system_behavior: ** Maintain a ruleset that flips the org into **Prepared** or **Elevated** posture when thresholds breach.
controls.timers_slas: ** Evaluate indicators hourly during business hours; daily after hours.
controls.edge_cases: ** False positives damped via two-consecutive-interval rule.
controls.access_control: ** CRO, Risk Engineering can edit thresholds; read-only for Ops.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Pager alert for posture “Elevated”; dashboard of breaches per week.
controls.purpose: Detect trouble early and stage response

controls.name: Safe-Mode Transaction Controls
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Reduce run/operational risk while maintaining member access; integrates with security program (12 CFR Part 748).
controls.system_behavior: ** Toggle **Safe-Mode** feature flag: set transaction limits, enable allowlists, disable new high-risk actions, preserve read-only access.
controls.timers_slas: ** Apply within ≤ 60 minutes of trigger; propagate to all processors ≤ 30 minutes after core change.
controls.edge_cases: ** Ensure critical inbound credits (e.g., payroll, benefits) remain open (allowlist).
controls.access_control: ** Dual-control (CEO/CRO) to enable; Ops executes propagation.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Monitor decline rates, member contact volume, cash levels.
controls.purpose: Rapidly limit risk while maintaining access

controls.name: Targeted Account Freeze
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Preserve assets and comply with directives; resolution context under FCUA §1787; integrated with §748 program.
controls.system_behavior: ** Freeze specified member accounts/entities; block debits; allow regulator-approved credits; display freeze reason codes.
controls.timers_slas: ** ≤ 30 minutes from approval to effective block.
controls.edge_cases: ** Joint accounts; fiduciary accounts; legal garnishments take precedence.
controls.access_control: ** Compliance initiates; Ops executes; Legal reviews orders.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Count of frozen accounts; median time-to-freeze.

controls.name: Institution-Wide Freeze
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Execute immediate, organization-level freeze when directed by Board emergency action or NCUA (FCUA §1786/§1787).
controls.system_behavior: ** Set global state **FROZEN**; block new liabilities; allow limited inbound credits per regulator guidance; lock new account onboarding.
controls.timers_slas: ** Initiate ≤ 60 minutes; public/member notice ≤ 2 hours.
controls.edge_cases: ** Offline channels (ATM) sync; third-party batch cutoffs.
controls.access_control: ** Board/CEO authorize; Ops executes; Communications sends.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Time to full propagation; number of failed auths by channel.

controls.name: Next-Business-Day Availability
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Maintain essential member access and information during stress; insured member expectations under §1787; safety/soundness (Part 741).
controls.system_behavior: ** By next business day, ensure member portal/API supports: balance inquiry, statement download, claim instructions, and contact routes; enable read-only mode if needed.
controls.timers_slas: ** Portal available by next local business open.
controls.edge_cases: ** DNS/hosting cutovers; CDN cache; ADA accessibility baseline.
controls.access_control: ** IT/DevOps controls platform; Comms publishes content.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Uptime; page latency; call abandonment rate.

controls.name: Trustee/Conservator Handover
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Enable orderly transfer of operations to NCUA-appointed conservator/liquidating agent (FCUA §1786(h), §1787; 12 CFR Part 709).
controls.system_behavior: ** Generate and deliver a standardized **Handover Packet** and grant scoped access to systems.
controls.timers_slas: ** Packet initial version ≤ 4 hours; full delivery ≤ 24 hours.
controls.edge_cases: ** Conflicting legal holds; vendor refusals—escalate to Legal + NCUA.
controls.access_control: ** CEO/GC approve; IAM provisions; vendors whitelisted.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Time to first successful trustee login; missing artifact count.
controls.purpose: Standardize a clean transfer to NCUA trustee

controls.name: Records Preservation for Resolution
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Preserve and produce reproducible records per Part 749; support claims and payout under Part 709/§1787.
controls.system_behavior: ** Build a **Resolution Records Package** with member/share/loan ledgers, ACH/card histories, GL, governance minutes, contracts, and BSA logs.
controls.timers_slas: ** Start ≤ 2 hours; complete ≤ 24 hours; monthly snapshots retained.
controls.edge_cases: ** Incomplete vendor exports—document and request extension via NCUA.
controls.access_control: ** Records Officer owns; IT executes; Legal verifies.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Export completeness %; restore-test success/failure.

controls.name: Testing & Validation
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Part 748 requires a security/incident program; safety/soundness demands demonstrable continuity and response.
controls.system_behavior: ** Run a structured test program covering safe-mode, freeze propagation, failover, and records restoration.
controls.timers_slas: ** Publish report ≤ 10 business days post-test; remediate high-risk items ≤ 30 days.
controls.edge_cases: ** Production freeze during business hours—simulate off-peak.
controls.access_control: ** CRO owns; IT/Compliance participate; Board Risk Committee reviews.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** RTO/RPO met %; propagation time p95; restore success rate.

controls.name: Governance & Review Cadence
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Clarify decision rights and oversight (FCUA; 12 CFR Part 741; §748.2).
controls.system_behavior: ** Maintain a RACI for resolution actions; ensure quarterly reviews and immediate updates after material events.
controls.timers_slas: ** Qtr review by day 20; policy update ≤ 30 days from change.
controls.edge_cases: ** Conflicts with vendor SLAs—log exception and mitigation.
controls.access_control: ** Board approves; CRO owns; Internal Audit tests.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Open action items; aging exceptions; training compliance %.

controls.name: Prohibition & Protected Bases
controls.why_reg_cite: Reg B §1002.4; FHA; NCUA 701.31\
controls.system_behavior: System and staff must not use protected traits or proxies at any stage; avoid unjustified disparate impact and redlining.\
controls.timers_slas: Annual policy review; quarterly Board reporting.\
controls.edge_cases: Neighborhood/ZIP as proxy; property-age/location as proxy (real-estate).\
controls.access_control: Compliance approves protected-trait list and proxy guardrails.\
controls.alerts_metrics: Exception rate; proxy variable flags.

controls.name: Permissible Inquiries
controls.system_behavior: Limit questions on spouse, marital status, sex, childbearing, immigration to what’s permitted; present required disclosures (e.g., alimony/child support need not be disclosed unless relied upon).\
controls.timers_slas: Disclosures shown **before** sensitive fields are collected.\
controls.edge_cases: Joint vs individual apps; visual observation when GMI refused.\
controls.access_control: Compliance owns disclosure text.\
controls.alerts_metrics: % apps with proper disclosures (target 100%).

controls.name: Evaluation & Pricing Rules
controls.system_behavior: Use demonstrably/statistically sound scoring or documented judgmental criteria; never assign negative factors for elderly; treat public-assistance income equally; require pricing exception capture/approval.\
controls.timers_slas: Monthly Compliance exception review by **the 10th**.\
controls.edge_cases: Term exceeds life expectancy; collateral adequacy; telephone listing not considered.\
controls.access_control: Designated approvers only.\
controls.alerts_metrics: Exception rate %; elderly negatives (target 0).\

controls.name: Appraisal Independence & ROV
controls.system_behavior: Do not rely on biased appraisals; provide reconsideration-of-value (ROV) pathway and log outcomes.\
controls.timers_slas: ROV review within **15 days** of request.\
controls.edge_cases: Multiple valuations; AVMs.\
controls.access_control: Separate valuation staff (no production influence).\
controls.alerts_metrics: # ROVs; % value changes.

controls.name: Action-Taken Notices
controls.why_reg_cite: Reg B §1002.9; FCRA\
controls.system_behavior: Generate and send notices per timing matrix; include score block when a score is used; handle joint/guarantor and business-credit nuances.\
controls.timers_slas: As per [Timing Matrix](fair-lending.md#timing-matrix).\
controls.edge_cases: Separate score disclosures for co-applicants; oral permissible for certain small-business phone apps (log rights disclosure).\
controls.access_control: Lending Ops/System send; Compliance can view/void/resend with reason.\
controls.alerts_metrics: On-time rate ≥ 99.5%; breach count 0.

controls.name: Government Monitoring (GMI/HMDA)
controls.why_reg_cite: Reg B §1002.13; Reg C\
controls.system_behavior: For covered transactions, **ask but do not require** GMI; if declined, record via visual/surname rule where required; maintain LAR accuracy.\
controls.timers_slas: Quarterly LAR QC; annual submission per Reg C calendar.\
controls.edge_cases: Mail/phone apps; multiple applicants.\
controls.access_control: Compliance owns HMDA mapping.\
controls.alerts_metrics: LAR error rate below threshold.

controls.name: Advertising & Fair Housing
controls.system_behavior: Enforce trigger-term disclosures; apply Fair Housing legend for real-estate ads; prohibit exclusionary geo-targeting; require pre-flight checklist.\
controls.timers_slas: Approval **before** launch.\
controls.edge_cases: Social/dynamic ads; co-marketing partners.\
controls.access_control: Marketing drafts; Compliance approves.\
controls.alerts_metrics: % ads with checklist (target 100%).

controls.name: LO Compensation & Anti-Steering
controls.system_behavior: Prohibit compensation based on loan terms/proxies; present/document meaningful alternatives (e.g., lowest rate, lowest fees, lowest total cost); block finalization without evidence.\
controls.timers_slas: Evidence **before** disposition.\
controls.edge_cases: <3 eligible options → Compliance waiver required.\
controls.access_control: LOs present/select; Compliance reviews.\
controls.alerts_metrics: Evidence rate 100%; exception trend.

controls.name: Third-Party Fair-Lending Oversight
controls.why_reg_cite: ECOA liability flows to creditor; NCUA TPRM\
controls.system_behavior: Perform due diligence at onboarding; require monthly Fair-Lending MI pack (apps/approvals/pricing/exceptions/complaints) from vendors; escalate corrective actions.\
controls.timers_slas: MI due by **5th business day** monthly.\
controls.edge_cases: Brokers/lead gens/appraisers/CRAs.\
controls.access_control: TPRM + Compliance.\
controls.alerts_metrics: MI on-time rate; unresolved CAPs.

controls.name: Monitoring & Reviews
controls.why_reg_cite: Program effectiveness & Board oversight\
controls.system_behavior: Quarterly disparity analytics (apps/approvals/price/terms/denials/exceptions); annual redlining review; Board reporting with corrective actions.\
controls.timers_slas: Quarterly by **+30 days**; annual redlining by **Q1**.\
controls.edge_cases: Low-volume segments → qualitative review.\
controls.access_control: Compliance leads; Lending/Analytics support.\
controls.alerts_metrics: Disparity deltas beyond thresholds trigger CAP.

controls.name: Training
controls.why_reg_cite: Control effectiveness\
controls.system_behavior: Role-based onboarding + annual; track completion; refresh on rule/product changes.\
controls.timers_slas: Within **30 days** of role start; annually by **Dec 31**.\
controls.edge_cases: Contractors/third parties included.\
controls.access_control: Compliance + HR.\
controls.alerts_metrics: Completion ≥ 98%.

controls.name: Record Retention
controls.why_reg_cite: Reg B §1002.12; Reg C\
controls.system_behavior: Retain specified records; extend on litigation/investigation hold.\
controls.timers_slas:
— Retention Grid:**

* Applications/decisions (consumer): **25 months**
* Applications/decisions (business ≤ $1MM): **12 months** _(oral allowed in some cases; keep logs)_
* Certain business credit (> $1MM or trade/factoring): **60 days**; if reasons requested or retain requested → **12 months**
* Existing-account adverse actions: **25 months**
* HMDA/GMI: per Reg C/Reg B calendars
* LO-Comp records: per Reg Z
* **Litigation/Investigation hold:** retain until final disposition   **EDGE CASES:** Self-tests retained **25 months** from completion.   **AUDIT LOGS:** `retention.clock_started`, `legal.hold_issued`, `legal.hold_released`   **ACCESS CONTROL:** Compliance + Legal.
controls.edge_cases: Self-tests retained **25 months** from completion.   **AUDIT LOGS:** `retention.clock_started`, `legal.hold_issued`, `legal.hold_released`   **ACCESS CONTROL:** Compliance + Legal.
controls.access_control: Compliance + Legal.

controls.name: Governance & Delegation
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Board governance under **FCUA**; written security and BSA programs under **12 CFR §748.1–§748.2**; AML program elements (internal controls, independent testing, training) under **31 U.S.C. §5318(h)** and **31 CFR §1020.210**.
controls.system_behavior: ** Maintain a living policy; Board approves limits schedule; cash-risk KRIs feed the AML governance dashboard; exceptions tracked and reported via BSA governance cadence.
controls.timers_slas: ** Annual review; monthly cash KRIs into AML dashboard; quarterly Board summaries.
controls.edge_cases: ** Interim regulatory change—Chair ratifies; Board at next meeting.
controls.access_control: ** Publish: CFO/Ops/Compliance (BSA Officer); Read: enterprise.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Policy age; open exceptions past due; AML control mapping completeness.

controls.name: Scope & Applicability
controls.why_reg_cite: ** FCUA governance and **§748.1** require comprehensive coverage; AML program must cover all relevant lines (**31 CFR §1020.210**).
controls.system_behavior: ** Tag covered **employees** (tellers, vault custodians, branch managers, ops/accounting, armored-courier liaisons, ATM/ITM custodians), **activities** (receipt, disbursement, shipment, storage, reconciliation, discrepancy handling, training, emergency/disaster), and **locations/channels** (branches, ops center, ATMs/ITMs, recyclers, night depository).
controls.timers_slas: ** Update before go-live of any new asset/role.
controls.edge_cases: ** Small sites—document compensating reviews and BSA monitoring ties.
controls.access_control: ** Ops updates; Compliance/BSA approves.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** % assets with assigned custodians/limits; % mapped to AML controls.

controls.name: Enterprise Cash Limit
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Prudently limit cash; ensure bond coverage (Part 713); inform AML liquidity/anomaly context (31 CFR §1020.210 internal controls).
controls.system_behavior: ** Enforce **Total Cash** ≤ **{X%\} of total assets**; auto-notify Treasury to invest excess; post breach flags to AML monitoring context.
controls.timers_slas: ** Remediate same day when exceeded.
controls.edge_cases: ** Seasonal needs—use [CA-10](cash-control.md#ca-10-seasonal-deviations--exceptions).
controls.access_control: ** Treasury executes; CFO reviews.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Days over cap; max deviation; bond headroom.
controls.purpose: Cap total cash vs. assets; invest excess

controls.name: Location & Device Cash Limits
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Prevent excessive exposure per vault/teller/ATM/ITM/recycler/petty fund; align to bond and security expectations (**§748.1**, Part 713); tie exceptions to AML internal control reviews (**31 CFR §1020.210**).
controls.system_behavior: ** Maintain per-asset limits: **Vault ${vault\_limit}**, **Teller ${teller\_limit}**, **ATM ${atm\_limit}**, **ITM/VTM ${itm\_limit}**, **Recycler ${recycler\_limit}**, **Petty ${petty\_limit}**; system warns/blocks loads above limit without exception ticket; feed exception telemetry to AML case mgmt.
controls.timers_slas: ** Real-time enforcement.
controls.edge_cases: ** Service outage—manual log with two signatures; back-entry within 1 business day.
controls.access_control: ** Dual custodians for vault/ATM/ITM/recycler operations.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Breach attempts; exception frequency by site; AML exception count.

controls.name: Dual Control, Keys & Combos
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Physical/operational controls (**§748.1**); AML internal controls mandate (**31 CFR §1020.210**).
controls.system_behavior: ** Enforce **dual control** for vault access, shipments, ATM/ITM loads, night-drop retrieval; maintain key/combination custodian registry; rotate on personnel change or every **90 days**; sealed backups.
controls.timers_slas: ** Immediate revocation on termination.
controls.edge_cases: ** Emergency access—incident ticket; post-event review.
controls.access_control: ** Need-to-know; background-checked roles only.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Overdue rotations; single-custodian attempts blocked.

controls.name: Reconciliation & GL Controls
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Reliable records and retrievability (**Part 749**); AML internal controls & independent testing rely on reconciliations (**31 CFR §1020.210**).
controls.system_behavior: ** Daily reconcile **teller, vault, ATM/ITM, recyclers, petty** to GL and subsidiary ledgers; zero-balance suspense within **{X} days**; require documentation for all postings; provide AML investigators access to reconciliation evidence.
controls.timers_slas: ** Same-day tie-out; suspense aging reviewed daily.
controls.edge_cases: ** System outage → manual count; back-post with dual approval.
controls.access_control: ** Separate custody vs. posting vs. reconciliation.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Late recons; suspense aging > {X} days.

controls.name: Over/Short Monitoring
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Detect losses/embezzlement; governance visibility (**§748.1**, **Part 715**); anomalies feed AML monitoring (**31 CFR §1020.210**).
controls.system_behavior: ** Track over/short **per person and location**; set thresholds for coaching/discipline; analyze patterns; escalate large or recurring items; auto-signal repeated anomalies to AML case mgmt.
controls.timers_slas: ** Investigate within **1 business day**; report monthly.
controls.edge_cases: ** Repeated near-limit shorts—initiate retraining/rotation.
controls.access_control: ** Managers/Compliance view; HR discipline records.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Top N outliers; repeat-offender count; AML referrals.

controls.name: ATM/ITM/Night-Drop & Shipments
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Secure handling and chain of custody (**§748.1**); audits (**Part 715**); AML internal controls require documented, testable procedures (**31 CFR §1020.210**).
controls.system_behavior: ** Dual-control **load/retrieval**; cassette totals recorded; night-drop logged with seal capture and (where available) video; **cash shipments** (inbound/outbound) logged, sealed, countersigned with courier receipts; match courier/fed credit to GL same day.
controls.timers_slas: ** Post night-drop **same day**; ATM/ITM balance at service completion; shipments verified and logged same day.
controls.edge_cases: ** Seal mismatch—stop, escalate, incident ticket; shipment discrepancy—immediate count and courier escalation.
controls.access_control: ** Named dual custodians only; shipment signers authenticated.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Seal exceptions; shipment discrepancy rate; time-to-post.

controls.name: Surprise Cash Counts & Audits
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Independent verification (**Part 715**); AML independent testing leverages count results (**31 CFR §1020.210**).
controls.system_behavior: ** Perform **surprise counts** across tellers, vaults, devices **at least monthly** per site; Supervisory Committee/independent audit conducts periodic reviews; feed results to AML independent testing workpapers; remediate findings.
controls.timers_slas: ** Variances resolved within **1 business day**; findings closed by due date.
controls.edge_cases: ** Inability to count—document; reschedule within 48h.
controls.access_control: ** SC/Audit independence preserved.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Count coverage %; open findings aging.

controls.name: Seasonal Deviations & Exceptions
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Temporary higher cash needs must be documented and bonded (Part 713); AML governance demands documented exceptions (31 CFR §1020.210).
controls.system_behavior: ** Formal **deviation memo** to Board: reason, duration, revised limits, bond/insurance adjustments; system whitelists temporary limits with expiry; AML exception log updated.
controls.timers_slas: ** Approval **before** exceeding limits; sunset on end date.
controls.edge_cases: ** Emergency surge—Chair + CEO interim approval, ratify next Board.
controls.access_control: ** CFO/Ops propose; Board approves.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Active deviations; days since last review.

controls.name: Training & Competency
controls.why_reg_cite: ** BSA program requires training (**31 U.S.C. §5318(h)**; **31 CFR §1020.210**); security program effectiveness depends on trained staff (**§748.1**).
controls.system_behavior: ** Initial + **annual** training: policy/limits, handling accuracy, counterfeit detection, fraud schemes, emergency/robbery response, dual control, device & **shipment** procedures; role-specific proficiency checks; training completion feeds AML program metrics.
controls.timers_slas: ** Complete within **30 days** of hire; annually thereafter.
controls.edge_cases: ** Failed proficiency—remediation and retest.
controls.access_control: ** Managers view team status; HR system of record.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** Completion rate; proficiency scores; overdue training counts.

controls.name: Monitoring, Reporting & Recordkeeping
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Ongoing oversight; evidence retention (**12 CFR §748.2**, **Part 749**); AML program requires internal controls & independent testing (**31 CFR §1020.210**).
controls.system_behavior: ** Monthly KPIs/KRIs (limit breaches, late recons, over/short trends, shipment discrepancies, device exceptions); exception log with officer attestation; retain evidence (count sheets, load/ship logs, dual-control logs, recon packs, courier tickets, audit/exam reports, Board materials) per schedule; provide exports for AML independent testing and examiner requests.
controls.timers_slas: ** Publish within **15 days** of month end; retention **≥ {X years}** per record type.
controls.edge_cases: ** Litigation hold supersedes purge.
controls.access_control: ** Records custodian role; examiner read-only export.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** On-time report %; retrieval success rate; open exceptions aging.

controls.name: Policy Scope & Risk Appetite
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Board-approved liquidity program and CFP are required (12 CFR §741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Enforce a single liquidity standard across \{{SCOPE\}}; align ALCO dashboards and alerts to limits.
controls.timers_slas: ** Review **annual**; ad-hoc within 10bd after material changes.
controls.edge_cases: ** BaaS partner launches with novel flow → temporary overlay documented.

controls.alerts_metrics: ** (metric.policy\_past\_due), (metric.limit\_waivers\_open).

controls.name: Definitions & Ratios Catalogue
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Common definitions ensure consistent measurement/reporting (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Central library for LAR, cumulative mismatch, survival horizon, concentration.
controls.timers_slas: ** Keep formulas synced with GL mapping **daily**.
controls.edge_cases: ** Data source outage → fallback to prior day with flag.
controls.access_control: ** CFO owns; Liquidity Analyst edits; read-only for others.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (metric.schema\_drift\_detected).

controls.name: Maturity Mismatch Limits
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Governance over cash-flow gaps is core to liquidity safety (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Compute cumulative gaps in buckets: O/N, 2–7d, 8–30d, 31–90d, 91–365d, >1y; compare to limits.
controls.timers_slas: ** Calculate **daily** by 16:00.
controls.edge_cases: ** Large unscheduled payoff → recalc intra-day.
controls.access_control: ** CFO approves limit changes; ALCO oversight.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (alert.gap\_breach), (metric.days\_negative\_gap).

controls.name: Survival Horizon Targets
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Ability to meet obligations under stress is required (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Model survival days for idiosyncratic and combined stress.
controls.timers_slas: ** Quarterly + ad-hoc within 2bd when EWIs spike.
controls.edge_cases: ** Facility operational issue → remove and re-run.
controls.access_control: ** CFO owns models; independent review annually.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (alert.survival\_below\_target).

controls.name: Liquid Assets Ratio Bands
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Internal thresholds provide early warning and map to CFP (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Compute **LAR** and classify: Normal ≥10%; Watch <10%; Low <8%; Critical <6% (policy-set).
controls.timers_slas: ** Daily by 16:00; alerts real-time on breach.
controls.edge_cases: ** Late custodian file → provisional LAR with flag.
controls.access_control: ** Read for ops; write restricted to Liquidity team.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (alert.lar\_watch), (alert.lar\_low), (alert.lar\_critical).

controls.name: Funding Concentration Limits
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Prevent over-reliance on single sources (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Track top 10 depositors; single-provider and facility reliance limits.
controls.timers_slas: ** Update **daily**; waivers within 2bd.
controls.edge_cases: ** Temporarily exceed limit during crisis → document CFP linkage.
controls.access_control: ** ALCO approves waivers.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (alert.concentration\_exceed).

controls.name: Stress Testing
controls.why_reg_cite: ** CFP must be supported by credible stress testing (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Run idiosyncratic, systemic, combined; include intraday peaks and BaaS shocks.
controls.timers_slas: ** **Quarterly**; re-run within 5bd upon major EWI.
controls.edge_cases: ** Data stale → mark and proceed with conservative overlays.
controls.access_control: ** CFO owner; Independent reviewer sign-off.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (metric.stress\_on\_time).

controls.name: Data & Model Governance
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Reliable inputs and validated methods (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Maintain lineage; reconcile to GL; catalog assumptions.
controls.timers_slas: ** Annual independent review; GL tie-out **daily**.
controls.edge_cases: ** Partial day outages → flag and annotate KPIs.
controls.access_control: ** Segregation between builders/reviewers.

controls.name: Reporting Cadence

controls.edge_cases: ** Holiday shifts → move to prior business day.

controls.timers_slas: ** **Within 24 hours.**
controls.edge_cases: ** After-hours trigger → notify next calendar day by 10:00 and document.
controls.access_control: ** CEO sender; CFO drafter; Board Chair CC.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (metric.notifications\_on\_time).

controls.why_reg_cite: ** ≥ $250MM must document access to a federal contingent source (§741.12); CLF statute **12 USC 1795**, Fed advances **12 USC 347b**.
controls.system_behavior: ** Maintain membership/agent access to **CLF** and operational readiness for **Discount Window**; keep collateral schedules current; conduct annual test (funded or no-funds).
controls.timers_slas: ** **Annual** by month-end of anniversary.
controls.edge_cases: ** Counterparty portal outage → phone protocol.
controls.access_control: ** CFO controls; Treasury Ops prepares files.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (metric.facility\_headroom), (metric.docs\_expiring).
controls.purpose: CLF and Fed Discount Window readiness.

controls.name: Collateral & Encumbrance
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Liquidity depends on pledgeable capacity (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Track eligible/unencumbered balances and haircuts by counterparty; optimize pledges.
controls.timers_slas: ** Update **daily**; re-check T+0 after large moves.
controls.edge_cases: ** Margin call → intraday pledge flow.
controls.access_control: ** Dual control for pledges.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (alert.headroom\_low).

controls.access_control: ** CFO approval required.

controls.name: CFP Purpose & Activation
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Written CFP required; executable under stress (§741.12).

controls.why_reg_cite: ** Detect stress early to preserve optionality (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Monitor: rapid asset growth via volatile liabilities; undue concentrations; negative press; earnings/asset-quality deterioration; rising funding costs; margin calls; early CD redemptions; correspondent line cuts.

controls.edge_cases: ** CEO unavailable → designate Acting CEO.

controls.edge_cases: ** Media inquiry → approved statement only.

controls.name: Regulator Liaison
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Maintain timely, accurate updates to NCUA (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Maintain examiner/region contacts; event memos; follow-ups; incident log.
controls.timers_slas: ** Respond within **1bd** unless otherwise directed.
controls.edge_cases: ** Conflicting requests → elevate to CEO/Board Chair.
controls.access_control: ** CEO primary, CFO backup.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (metric.ncua\_sla\_met).

controls.edge_cases: ** Missed objective → immediate corrective plan.
controls.access_control: ** CFO/CEO co-owners.

controls.name: Purpose and Scope
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Written, executable CFP required for insured credit unions (12 CFR §741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** CFP spans funding playbooks, roles, monitoring, testing, notification, and comms across \{{SCOPE\}}; integrates with dashboard in [CFP-08](contingency-funding-plan.md#cfp-08-liquidity-dashboard-and-ratios-interface).
controls.timers_slas: ** Annual review; ad-hoc within 10bd after material changes.

controls.name: Governance and Roles

controls.system_behavior: ** CEO chairs crisis team; CFO runs liquidity ops; ALCO advises; Board authorizes extraordinary actions.

controls.edge_cases: ** CEO unavailable → Acting CEO per succession matrix.
controls.access_control: ** CEO manages spokespersons; dual-auth for external draws.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (metric.escalation\_time).

controls.why_reg_cite: ** Early detection preserves optionality (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Monitor: rapid asset growth from volatile liabilities; undue concentrations; negative press; deterioration in earnings/asset quality; rising funding costs; margin calls; early CD redemptions; line cuts.
controls.timers_slas: ** **Daily** review; **weekly** CEO digest.
controls.edge_cases: ** Rumor spikes → comms prepped via [CFP-12](contingency-funding-plan.md#cfp-12-communications-and-stakeholders).
controls.access_control: ** CFO owner; Risk read-only.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (alert.ewi\_red), (metric.ewi\_ack\_time).

controls.name: Activation Levels and Triggers
controls.why_reg_cite: ** CFP must specify clear activation criteria (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior:
** Map metrics to **Level 1 Watch**, **Level 2 Low**, **Level 3 Critical**. Examples:
  * Level 1: LAR below policy floor (e.g., 10%); EWIs sustained red.
  * Level 2: LAR < 8% **or** survival < 30d idio / < 20d combined.
  * Level 3: LAR < 6% **or** outflow ≥ 40%/10d, imminent payment failure.
controls.timers_slas: ** Initiate actions within **2 hours** of Level 2/3.
controls.edge_cases: ** False positives → revert with rationale.
controls.access_control: ** CEO authorizes Level 2/3.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (metric.time\_to\_activate).

controls.name: Funding Sources Catalogue and Draw Order
controls.why_reg_cite: ** CFP must enumerate actionable sources (§741.12); CLF (**12 USC 1795**) and Fed advances (**12 USC 347b**) as federal backstops.
controls.system_behavior:
** Maintain **ordered** sources with capacity, tenor, cost, and draw steps.

Internal sources:

* Cash/Fed & corporate CU balances
* Unencumbered AFS (sell/pledge)
* Saleable/participation-ready loans

External sources:

* FHLB (if eligible)
* **Discount Window**
* **CLF**
* Listing-service time deposits within policy
controls.timers_slas: ** Execute first-line actions within **2 hours** at Level 2.
controls.edge_cases: ** Counterparty outage → alternate path from contact sheet.
controls.access_control: ** Dual authorization for external draws.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (metric.cost\_of\_funds), (metric.headroom\_days).

controls.name: Backup Funding and Collateral Readiness
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Maintain **contingent** access to federal liquidity (§741.12; 12 USC 1795; 12 USC 347b).
controls.system_behavior: ** Keep **backup** sources pre-documented: CLF/agent membership; DW borrower-in-custody or pledged collateral; standby listing-service capacity; correspondent fed funds lines (if applicable).
controls.timers_slas: ** Daily inventory update; monthly readiness check; annual no-funds test.
controls.edge_cases: ** Security in dispute → remove from headroom until cleared.
controls.access_control: ** Dual control on pledges/releases.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (alert.headroom\_low), (metric.encumbrance\_pct).

controls.name: Action Plans and Playbooks
controls.why_reg_cite: ** CFP must be executable, not aspirational (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior:
** For each Level, attach a **playbook** with owners, steps, and timers:

Level 1 Watch

* Verify data; inventory facilities; test contacts; pre-stage collateral; tighten pricing.

Level 2 Low

* Execute ordered draws; lengthen funding tenor; pause discretionary lending; initiate depositor comms.

Level 3 Critical

* Emergency funding + asset liquidation; hourly liquidity pack; Board continuous updates.
controls.timers_slas: ** First tasks within **2 hours** at Level 2; **immediate** at Level 3.
controls.edge_cases: ** Inability to draw planned facility → branch to backup in [CFP-06](contingency-funding-plan.md#cfp-06-backup-funding-and-collateral-readiness).
controls.access_control: ** CFO controls tasks; CEO approves deviations.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (metric.tasks\_on\_time), (metric.playbook\_drift).

controls.name: Liquidity Dashboard and Ratios Interface
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Ratios/monitoring must be programmatic and timely (§741.12 intent).
controls.system_behavior: ** Spreadsheet/dashboard computes: **LAR**, cumulative **mismatch gaps** (O/N, 2–7d, 8–30d, 31–90d, 91–365d, >1y), **survival horizon**, **top depositor concentrations**, **facility headroom**, and **scenario outflows**.
controls.timers_slas: ** Refresh **daily by 17:00**; intraday refresh on event.
controls.edge_cases: ** Missing custodian file → provisional status with flag.
controls.access_control: ** Read for execs; write for Liquidity team.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (alert.band\_change), (metric.dashboard\_ontime).

controls.name: Stress Scenarios and Survival Horizon
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Credible stress testing underpins CFP (§741.12).
controls.system_behavior: ** Maintain **base**, **idiosyncratic**, **systemic**, and **combined** scenarios; model **intraday** peaks; compute survival days and required actions.
controls.timers_slas: ** **Quarterly**; ad-hoc within **5bd** on material change.
controls.edge_cases: ** Facility eligibility reduced → recompute survival immediately.
controls.access_control: ** CFO owner; independent review annually.
controls.alerts_metrics: ** (alert.survival\_below\_target).
controls.purpose: Design/refresh of stress tests and survival days.

controls.name: Testing and Drills
controls.why_reg_cite: ** Demonstrate operability of CFP and federal access (§741.12; 12 USC 1795; 12 USC 347b).
controls.system_behavior: ** Conduct **annual** no-funds (or funded) test of **CLF** or **Discount Window**; **annual** tabletop crisis drill; remediate gaps.
controls.timers_slas: ** Publish AAR within **10bd** of drill/test.
controls.edge_cases: ** Partial failure → immediate corrective plan with deadline.
controls.access_control: ** CFO/CEO co-owners.

controls.access_control: ** CEO sender; CFO drafter; Board Chair CC.

controls.edge_cases: ** Media inbound → use approved statement only.
controls.access_control: ** Comms team edit; Board view.
